title: I'm Quitting Heroing
text:
is a Japanese fantasy <a href="light%20novel">light novel</a> series written by Quantum and illustrated by Hana Amano. It began serialization online in January 2017 on <a href="Kadokawa%20Corporation">Kadokawa</a>'s user-generated novel publishing website Kakuyomu. It was later published by <a href="Fujimi%20Shobo">Fujimi Shobo</a> with three volumes since December 2017 under their Kadokawa Books imprint. A <a href="manga">manga</a> adaptation with art by Nori Kazato has been serialized online via <a href="Kadokawa%20Shoten">Kadokawa Shoten</a>'s "Young Ace Up" website since May 2018 and has been collected in five "<a href="tank%C5%8Dbon">tankōbon</a>" volumes. Both the light novel and manga are licensed in North America by Kadokawa. An <a href="anime">anime</a> television series adaptation by <a href="EMT%20Squared">EMT Squared</a> is scheduled to air from April 2022.
Media.
Light novels.
The series is written by Quantum and illustrated by Hana Amano. Originally serialized online on Kakuyomu in January 2017, <a href="Fujimi%20Shobo">Fujimi Shobo</a> began publishing the series in print under their Kadokawa Books imprint in December 2017. Three volumes have been released as of October 2018. <a href="Kadokawa%20Corporation">Kadokawa</a> will publish the novels in English.
Manga.
A <a href="manga">manga</a> adaptation with art by Nori Kazato began serialization on <a href="Kadokawa%20Shoten">Kadokawa Shoten</a>'s "Young Ace Up" website on May 31, 2018. Five "<a href="tank%C5%8Dbon">tankōbon</a>" volumes have been released as of May 2021. An English digital release is being published by Kadokawa on its <a href="BookWalker">BookWalker</a> website.
Anime.
An <a href="anime">anime</a> television series adaptation was announced on October 20, 2021. The series is animated by <a href="EMT%20Squared">EMT Squared</a> and directed by Hisashi Ishii, with Yuu Nobuta serving as chief director, Shigeru Murakoshi overseeing the series' scripts, and Yuki Nakano designing the characters. It is set to premiere in April 2022. The opening theme song is "Broken Identity" by <a href="Minori%20Suzuki">Minori Suzuki</a>.
